titles.title: For the relief of Norman M. Werner.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 11/16/1995--Introduced. Entitles a named individual to hospital insurance benefits provided under Medicare Part A beginning on the first day of the first month after this Act's enactment. Provides that such individual's initial enrollment period under Medicare Part B shall be the seven-month period that begins on the above date.
